dream.this: This dream was born August 2015 by two college students. They joined together and created SAVE. We, here at SAVE, have seen a need in the world. We have seen too much poverty, too much hunger, and too much neglect. We want all to be part of the solution, to help solve these world problems. As you help we promise that you will feel the joy of giving.
dream.every: Every time someone buys a shirt, proceeds go to ending poverty, ending hunger, and ending this neglect. Who will you save next?

save.buy: Buy SAVE, YOU SAVE, WE all SAVE.
save.we: We can all make a difference in the world.
